title: Modern 3 BR Living with Premium Amenities at Your Fingertips.
posting_body: Deeply Affordable Apartments At Almost $600 Less Than Nearby Communities!
HURRY – our new rent-restricted apartments are going fast!
Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily today to reserve your brand-new home.
Conveniently located near the town’s best dining, shopping, and entertainment hotspots, you will always find a new adventure just around the corner.
Our community offers 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments for our residents.
These affordable apartment homes have spacious floor plans that are designed with you in mind.
Keeping quality and comfort in mind, we provide unbeatable amenities to our residents who call South Range Crossings, ‘home’.
Community amenities include but are not limited to a fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, outdoor playground, picnic & BBQ areas, and a community clubhouse with a full kitchen and fireplace.
Look no further, your new home at South Range Crossings awaits!
Call today and be sure to schedule a tour.
- Clubhouse with Wood Beamed Ceilings & Architectural Trusses
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
South Range Crossings participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,260 | 2 Occupants: $56,280 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
